faq.title: Questions? We got you.
faq.a1: Yes. We don’t collect names, phone numbers, or device IDs. Your report is 100% anonymous and encrypted.
faq.q2: Can I report incidents if I’m just visiting?
faq.a2: You can view alerts in all cities, but to submit a report, you must be physically in that country.
faq.q3: What types of reports can I submit?
faq.a3: Traffic, crime, accidents, fires, protests, roadblocks, weather, and more. Choose the type, write, snap a photo, and send.
faq.q4: What does the AI do with my report?
faq.a4: Every 15 minutes, our AI analyzes all reports to detect trends, verify credibility, and update the public dashboard.
faq.q5: Can I collaborate or donate to CityEasy?
faq.a5:
Absolutely. CityEasy is an independent civic tech project — we welcome community support to keep the platform running and expanding.

You can contribute directly via Bitcoin or the Lightning Network to support infrastructure, server costs, and future deployments in more cities.

Donations are anonymous, borderless, and help us maintain full independence from political and corporate agendas.
